DOC.brief_summary: This study design follow patient , participate PEP005-028 study observe complete clearance Actinic Keratosis ( AK ) lesion , 12 month period ass recurrence AK lesion long term safety select treatment area .
DOC.brief_title: A Long Term Follow Study Patients Who Have Complete Clearance Their Actinic Keratosis ( AK ) Lesions Day 57 Visit PEP005-028 Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Patient provide informed consent document signing Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) prior studyrelated procedure Patient achieve complete clearance AK lesion ( lesion count 0 ) select treatment area Day 57 visit follow Peplin AK clinical Study : PEP005028 Exclusion Concurrent participation another research study would involve select treatment area ( except poststudy followup visit previous Peplin AK study ) Early termination study PEP005028
